name: MediaItem
desc: A particular piece of media that an intent references, such as a song, podcast episode, or playlist.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: An identifier for the media item that’s stable within the Session and unique among all media of this type within this Session.

items.name: title
items.desc: The name of this media item.

items.name: artist
items.desc: The performer of this media item.
